scripts.build:win-x64: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=windows&& set GOARCH=amd64&& set CC=zig cc -target x86_64-windows-gnu&& garble -tiny build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ./binaries/core-win-x64.node -buildmode=c-shared .
scripts.build:win-arm64: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=windows&& set GOARCH=arm64&& set CC=zig cc -target aarch64-windows-gnu&& garble -tiny build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ./binaries/core-win-arm64.node -buildmode=c-shared .
scripts.build:linux-x64: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=linux&& set GOARCH=amd64&& set CC=zig cc -target x86_64-linux-gnu&& garble -tiny build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ./binaries/core-linux-x64.node -buildmode=c-shared .
scripts.build:linux-arm64: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=linux&& set GOARCH=arm64&& set CC=zig cc -target aarch64-linux-gnu&& garble -tiny build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ./binaries/core-linux-arm64.node -buildmode=c-shared .
scripts.build:linux-arm: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=linux&& set GOARCH=arm&& set CC=zig cc -target arm-linux-gnueabihf&& garble -tiny build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ./binaries/core-linux-arm.node -buildmode=c-shared .
scripts.build:macos-intel: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=darwin&& set GOARCH=amd64&& set CC=zig cc -target x86_64-macos&& garble -tiny build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ./binaries/core-darwin-x64.node -buildmode=c-shared .
scripts.build:macos-arm: set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=darwin&& set GOARCH=arm64&& set CC=zig cc -target aarch64-macos&& garble -tiny build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ./binaries/core-darwin-arm64.node -buildmode=c-shared .
scripts.build: set PATH=%USERPROFILE%\\go\\bin;%PATH% && pnpm run setup:tools && pnpm run build:win-x64 && pnpm run build:linux-x64 && pnpm run build:linux-arm64
